title: IbmWchSdk Generate Layouts Schema
description: Generates layouts and layout mappings based on type information in a batch in the wchtools folder. The names of the artifacts are derived from the type names.

data.description: The path to the directory of the WCH data artifacts.

path.description: The path to create the layouts.

include.description: Type names or IDs to include, a regular expression.

exclude.description: Type names or IDs to exclude, a regular expression.
